title: I have a confession to make...
self_text: So, I've been watching a lot of anime lately, and I've noticed something about the main characters. They always seem to be in situations where they are either accidentally falling on someone else's breasts or getting their face shoved into them. And it got me thinking, what if I could experience that myself?  I know it sounds weird, but it's just a fantasy. I would never actually do anything like that. But sometimes, when I'm walking down the street, I can't help but imagine what it would be like to fall onto a girl's breasts. Or maybe even get my face shoved into them. It's just a harmless fantasy, right? I mean, it's not like I'm going to act on it. But still, it's there, lurking in the back of my mind. And I don't know how to get rid of it.  I feel so dirty just thinking about it. But at the same time, I can't help but feel curious. Is this normal? Am I the only one who has these thoughts?  I need to tell someone, but I'm afraid of being judged. My friends would think I'm a pervert, and my family would be disgusted. So I'm turning to you, Reddit. Please, tell me, am I alone?  And more importantly, is there anything I can do to stop these thoughts? I don't want to be a creep, but I can't seem to control my imagination.

title: Interesting fact about the krabby patty
self_text: The Krabby Patty is made of sea bugs and crab butts, not crab meat. In the episode "Squid's Day Off", when Squidward took over the restaurant, he didn't know how to make the patties, so he asked Mr. Krabs for a recipe, but Mr. Krabs said that the secret formula was something he couldn't write down, but could show him, so Mr. Krabs showed Squidward all the ingredients and steps in making the Krabby Patties, which were sea bugs and crab butts.

title: I found a great shitpost while looking at the quora results for how to make a valkyrie in destiny 2
self_text: > What is it like being a lesbian?  I'm not, but I've always been curious about what it feels like to have sex with another woman.  Is it like having sex with yourself?  And if so, why would anyone want that?  It seems really boring.  I understand there are many reasons someone might be a lesbian, and I don't want to offend anyone by asking this question, but I'm genuinely curious.  As a heterosexual man who has only ever had sex with women, I can't imagine why someone would choose to have sex with someone of their own gender.  I mean, isn't sex supposed to be about the thrill of the chase and the difference between men and women?  If you're just having sex with someone who is exactly like you, then where is the excitement?  Where is the challenge?  I know some people say that it's about emotional connection, but I think that's just an excuse.  If you really wanted an emotional connection with someone, you could just talk to them.  You don't need to have sex with them.  So, yeah, I'm just trying to understand what it's like being a lesbian.  I'm not judging anyone, I'm just curious.  I mean, I'm sure there are lots of things about other people's lives that I don't understand, but I try to be open-minded and respectful.  But honestly, the idea of having sex with another woman just doesn't appeal to me.  It seems really boring and repetitive.  Like, what's the point?  I mean, if you're just going to do the same thing you already do on your own, then why bother?  I guess it's just not for me.  But I still want to understand.  Can someone explain it to me?  Please?

title: I found out that my boyfriend is a furry
self_text: I've been dating this guy for about 2 years now, and everything has always been going well with us. We have the same interests, love to watch movies together, and just generally enjoy spending time in each other's presence. But recently, I found out something about him that really threw me off... he's a furry.  I don't know much about furries, but from what I understand, they're people who are into anthropomorphic animals. He didn't tell me himself, I had to find it out on his computer when I was using it to do some work.  I mean, it's not like I'm judging or anything, but it feels like he's been hiding a big part of his life from me. It just makes me feel like I don't really know him at all. I'm trying to be supportive, but it's hard to wrap my head around. Anyone else ever deal with this? What should I do?

title: How do I deal with my girlfriend being an extreme nerd?
self_text: My (23M) girlfriend, Sarah (21F), is a huge nerd and she's always talking about her interests that are really strange to me. She likes video games like League of Legends, Roblox, Minecraft, Pok√©mon, Mario Kart and many more. She also watches lots of anime, especially the ones that have a lot of sexual content in them. It doesn't bother me too much but sometimes it's just weird for me because I don't know anything about what she's saying. She's always on Reddit looking at memes and posting in subreddits like r/copypasta and r/dankmemes. Sometimes she shows me memes but they're usually pretty stupid or offensive. She also loves to play cards and board games like Magic The Gathering and Dungeons and Dragons, which I think is kinda lame. I don't mind that she has hobbies and interests that are different from mine, but it feels like she doesn't want to spend time doing things with me unless it involves her nerd stuff. We used to go out to dinner and movies together, but now she just wants to stay home and play video games or watch anime. I tried to get her to come to a baseball game with me last week, but she said she was busy playing a new video game. I feel like she's pushing me away and only cares about her nerdy interests. I don't want to break up with her, but I'm starting to feel like we're growing apart. AITA for feeling this way?

title: I can't believe you are all falling for the shitpost
self_text: This is a very obvious attempt to get people to engage in arguments and fuel the culture war that has been going on for years now.  I'm not sure what side of the argument this person falls on, but they clearly don't care which side wins as long as there's conflict.  This isn't some crazy idea from a conspiracy theorist or something. It's just someone trying to stir up drama, it's nothing more than trolling.   It doesn't matter if we argue with them or try to debunk their claims. They don't care about any of that. All they want is engagement. Every comment they receive will only encourage them to continue doing this.  What does matter is that we stop feeding the troll and ignore them. If no one engages, they'll eventually give up.  And honestly, even if they don't, who cares? As long as we aren't giving them attention, they can't hurt us. So please, let's just ignore this person and move on. There are far more important things to worry about.

title: Fun fact about Japanese toilets
self_text: You know how Japanese toilets have a lot of buttons on the side? Well, there's actually an option to play music while you poop. The music is usually something relaxing like ocean waves or rain, but some toilets even come with a selection of classical music. If you don't want to listen to music, you can also choose to flush the toilet automatically after you're done, and many Japanese toilets even come with a built-in air freshener that will spray a pleasant scent into the room after you've finished your business. So if you ever find yourself in Japan and need to use the bathroom, be sure to take advantage of all the cool features that these high-tech toilets have to offer!

title: The Bible is a shittier book than the Quran
self_text: The Bible is an unoriginal, badly-written and poorly translated copy of previous Mesopotamian stories such as the Epic of Gilgamesh.  The Quran is still more original. I‚Äôm not saying the Quran is good, but at least it doesn‚Äôt have multiple authors editing it for millennia to make it better or fit their agendas. (Or worse) The Torah alone has like five different versions, so you can choose whatever version suits your agenda best. The first four books are just copies from Sumerian/Akkadian mythology with the names changed. And then they added extra stuff after that, which contradicts all previous texts. So now we have a text that doesn‚Äôt even follow its own rules anymore. Also, there were multiple people writing it over hundreds of years, and none of them ever met Jesus. They literally made up everything they wrote about him after he died. And then there‚Äôs Revelation, which is basically the author on drugs, describing what he sees in his mind while tripping. If anything, Christians should be burning Revelations instead of the Quran because it‚Äôs blasphemous to God. The only thing worse than the Old Testament is the New Testament. The New Testament makes God look like a complete idiot who could create humans and know exactly how things would turn out without knowing how they would turn out. If God created Adam and Eve knowing that they would sin, then why did He punish them? It's like if I set my dog up to fail by leaving food where he can reach it, then punish him for eating it. That's cruel and evil! God is literally setting His creations up to fail. How can anyone praise a God like that? That's the definition of abuse! Then He sends Jesus to die to save us from Himself! So now God needs saving? What kind of god needs saving? You need someone to save you from yourself? Sounds like a narcissist to me. Not to mention that Jesus says "I am God" in the bible, so now we have a narcissist god creating narcissistic humans. God is literally turning everyone into himself. No wonder nobody wants to worship Him. But hey, at least the bible contains some good quotes. Like when Jesus said "Let the dead bury their own dead".  That sounds really nice. Or when he said ‚ÄúI am the way, the truth, and the life‚Äù. Who cares about the rest of the world, right? As long as you have the truth, nothing else matters.   But hey, at least the bible isn‚Äôt as bad as the Book of Mormon. At least the bible doesn‚Äôt say that skin color is a sign of righteousness.

title: I like my food to be hot
self_text: My wife is from Thailand and she likes her Thai food extremely spicy, while I enjoy the occasional spicy dish, I cannot stand it when it‚Äôs too hot. We went out for dinner last night with some friends and my wife ordered a curry that she said was ‚Äúmedium‚Äù spice level, but for me, it would be absolutely intolerable. She insisted on ordering us both the same dish so we could share and experience the flavors together. When the food arrived, I hesitantly tried the curry, expecting to have my mouth burned off. But to my surprise, it was actually quite delicious! It had a nice warmth to it, but wasn‚Äôt overwhelmingly hot. I told my wife how much I enjoyed it and she smiled and said, ‚ÄúI told you it wouldn‚Äôt be too bad!‚Äù We continued to share the curry throughout the meal and I found myself really enjoying it. After dinner, as we were walking home, my wife asked me if I wanted to try something special she had been working on in the kitchen. She led me into the house and took me to the stove where she had a pot simmering. As soon as I got close, I smelled an intense heat coming from the pot. My wife explained that she had been making a chili paste using ghost peppers and habaneros, and she wanted me to try it. I politely declined, telling her that I appreciated the thought, but I just couldn‚Äôt handle anything that spicy. She looked disappointed, but didn‚Äôt push it. Later that night, as I was getting ready for bed, I noticed a small bowl of chili paste sitting on my bedside table. Next to it was a note that read, ‚ÄúJust a little taste üòâ‚Äù. I sighed and knew I was in trouble. I tentatively dipped a toothpick into the chili paste and touched it to my tongue. Immediately, my mouth erupted in flames! I ran to the bathroom and gargled with water for what felt like an eternity, but the burning sensation wouldn‚Äôt go away. I finally managed to fall asleep, but woke up several times during the night with my mouth still on fire. The next morning, my wife asked me how I liked the chili paste. I forced a smile and said, ‚ÄúIt was‚Ä¶ interesting.‚Äù She laughed and said, ‚ÄúI know you can handle more spice than you think!‚Äù I realized then that my wife wasn‚Äôt trying to torture me, she just wanted to share her love of spicy food with me. And maybe, just maybe, she also enjoyed watching me suffer a little bit.

title: My dad is a bitch
self_text: My dad's been having problems with his stomach for months now and has been taking meds to help him but they don't seem to be doing anything, so he decided that he would go on the world wide web and look up some home remedies to help him out. He finds something about how you can use apple cider vinegar to cure your stomach issues, so naturally he goes down to the store and buys himself a jug of it and starts drinking it everyday. Well, after a week or so, he calls me up and tells me that his stomach has gotten worse than before. So I ask him if he's still drinking the apple cider vinegar, and he says yes because he thought that maybe it just needed more time to work. So I tell him that he should stop drinking it and see if that helps, and he does and sure enough, within a day or two his stomach is back to normal. But then a few weeks later he decides he wants to try it again because he heard that it takes a while for it to start working, so he starts drinking it again and once again his stomach gets worse. This happens a third time too. And finally he asks me why it keeps making his stomach worse every time he tries it. So I ask him what kind of apple cider vinegar he's using and he says "the really cheap stuff" and I told him that he should get the good kind that comes in a bottle with the mother in it. So he goes down to the store and buys the expensive kind with the mother and starts drinking it. He drinks it for a week straight and nothing changes, so he gives up and stops drinking it and his stomach goes back to normal. Then one day when my mom is cleaning the kitchen she notices that there are three jugs of the cheap stuff that my dad bought stacked up in the pantry, so she asks him why he bought so much if he wasn't even using it, and he says that he was going to mix it with water and clean the floors with it. She asked him if he knew that that stuff smells like shit and he said no. She asked him why he didn't notice and he said that he had lost his sense of smell from getting covid a few months ago. The end.

title: I'm a retard, but I need help
self_text: My friend and I have been working on making a game for like 3 months now, we're both very new to game development (I've done some simple python stuff before) and it's going pretty good so far, however our biggest issue is the fact that neither of us know anything about shaders or how to use them  We want to make an RPG where the camera is always top down (like Pok√©mon or Stardew Valley) but the art style is made with pixel art and we want the sprites to be in 2D while everything else (the map tiles, UI etc.) are rendered in 3D   We've tried using different techniques to render the sprites as if they were 2D (like creating planes with texture) but the problem is that when you move the camera around, the sprites will rotate and change their angle depending on your position relative to them which looks really bad  We also tried rendering the sprites into textures (using a separate viewport) then applying those textures to planes in the main viewport, but the performance isn't great since every time the sprites move, the whole scene needs to be rerendered and we get a lot of lag even on low res textures  Do you guys know any way we can achieve what we want without having to create a bunch of 2D code? We're using Unity btw

title: God is dead
self_text: I was talking to my dad about how he had been going to church for decades, but has recently lost faith in god and stopped attending church  He told me that when he was younger, his parents would always tell him what to do and believe, and they were very strict  But as he got older and learned more about the world, he started to question things  He said he realized that there were a lot of contradictions in the Bible, and that a lot of the things people believed about god didn't make sense  He also said that he had seen a lot of suffering in the world, and he couldn't understand why a loving god would allow it  I asked him if he still believed in heaven or hell  He said he didn't know  He said he used to think that heaven was a place where you went when you died if you were good, and hell was a place where you went if you were bad  But now he thinks that those are just stories that people made up to try to explain the unknown  I asked him if he was scared to die without knowing what happens after death  He said he wasn't  He said he thought that death was just the end, and that there was nothing to be afraid of  I asked him if he missed going to church  He said he did, because he liked seeing his friends and being part of a community  But he said he couldn't go back to believing in something that he knew wasn't true  I told him that I respected his decision, and that I was proud of him for thinking for himself  I said that I didn't agree with everything he said, but I understood why he felt the way he did  He smiled at me and said that he was proud of me too  He said that he hoped I would always be able to think for myself, and that I wouldn't let anyone tell me what to believe  We talked for another hour or so, and we had a really good conversation  It was nice to be able to talk to my dad about something so personal and important, and it was nice to see that he was happy with his decision  I don't know if I agree with everything he said, but I respect his right to believe whatever he wants  And I'm glad that he's finally found peace with his own beliefs

title: I have a lot of free time
self_text: Here‚Äôs some things that happened today  I was sitting in my room, not doing anything. My mom walks in and says ‚Äúhey, wanna go to the store?‚Äù I said yes, so we went. When we got there she had me grab all these things for her to make dinner. She asked me if I wanted something, so I grabbed a juice box and started walking back to her when I saw it. The holy grail of snacks. A chocolate brownie. It looked amazing. So I grabbed it, walked up to my mom, and asked if I could get it. She said no because I just drank a juice box with a ton of sugar in it. But I told her I haven‚Äôt eaten all day. She gave me $10 and said I can buy whatever I want. I ran straight for the brownies, but they were all gone. Devastated, I started looking around for more. Then I see it again. Another chocolate brownie. I grab it, run up to my mom, and ask if I can buy it. She tells me to put it back because it isn't good for me. Then my brother comes along and sees what I have. He asks if he can have it. My mom says yes because "he has been good". I start getting angry. I tell my mom she is being unfair because I haven't done anything wrong either. She starts yelling at me about how I am always complaining and never appreciate anything she does for me. I yell back saying that is not true. We keep going back and forth until I storm off and sit on the floor. Then she says ‚Äúif you don‚Äôt stop crying I‚Äôm leaving you here‚Äù. I start crying even harder. She then leaves without me and I‚Äôm left alone in the store.  My mom calls me after 5 minutes and tells me to come out and meet her by the entrance. I walk outside and my brother is waiting for me. He gives me his brownie.  The End

title: The most depressing thing I‚Äôve ever read
self_text: I was scrolling through the subreddits for shitposts and found a copypasta that said ‚ÄúI want to be a furry‚Äù on r/copypast, so I decided to look into it and went on Google and typed ‚Äúfurry‚Äù. That‚Äôs when I saw what a furry really was and I immediately closed my browser. It was as if I had seen something evil and horrifying. I didn‚Äôt sleep well that night and couldn‚Äôt stop thinking about it. The next day at school I told my friends about it and they all started laughing hysterically and telling me stories of how they are furries too. They tried to get me to join them but I refused because I knew it was wrong. Since then I can‚Äôt stop thinking about the image of a man wearing a dog suit doing sexual acts with another man in a cat suit. I have been having nightmares every night and haven‚Äôt been able to eat or sleep properly. My parents say I need to see a therapist because I‚Äôm becoming depressed. They don‚Äôt understand what I‚Äôm going through. They think I‚Äôm just being dramatic but I know I‚Äôm not. I feel like my life is ruined and I will never be happy again.

title: How did you guys survive the pandemic?
self_text: I don't know how some of y'all survived the pandemic. I had to stop eating and drinking for a while because there was no toilet paper in stores. My poop went from normal, brown, mushy soft serve to grey cement that could break rocks if thrown hard enough. It felt like it was going to rip my asshole into pieces every time I shit. I spent hours on the toilet trying to push something out but nothing came. I started getting stomach cramps from pushing so much and I thought I was dying.  I even tried soaking my butt in water just so it would be slippery enough to get the poop out. Nothing worked. I didn't want to go to the hospital or doctor because they were full of Covid patients.  I just kept eating nothing and drinking nothing until all the poo came out. It took almost two weeks before I had a good bowel movement again. I couldn't feel anything down there anymore. I have no idea what happened to all that crap that was stuck inside me. Did it dissolve? Did it turn to gas? Did it come out when I farted? I will never know. But I am forever scarred from this experience.  When I finally shitted after not having gone for two weeks I could see the bottom of my ass when I looked at the toilet. The only thing keeping me alive right now is the fact that the apocalypse hasn't happened yet.  But it will happen eventually. Then I can let loose and shit without worrying about running out of toilet paper. At least then I won't have to worry about any more pain.

title: Copypasta from my friend's Discord server
self_text: I am a big fan of the Pok√©mon franchise and so are many of my friends, but after watching all of the episodes and movies on Netflix I have noticed something wrong with them. It is very hard to watch any of these shows or movies without noticing that there is an ungodly amount of black people in Pok√©mon, especially considering the fact that it is set in Japan. When I first started watching these shows I didn‚Äôt notice anything strange about the characters, but now that I think back at it I can tell they were trying to sneak in some diversity into their show by making a lot of the human characters look like black people instead of Japanese people. They did not do a good job hiding this, as it is quite obvious when you start looking for it. The same thing happens in the Pok√©mon movies, where the main protagonist always ends up being a black person. Even in the video games themselves, if you pay attention you will notice that the majority of the gym leaders and champions are black people. This makes me question whether the original game was originally created by someone who was white. Maybe he just wanted to make the franchise more diverse because his own country lacked diversity? Either way, I think that we should be critical of these types of things and call out the people who are trying to push an agenda onto us through our childhood memories.  The last thing I want to see happen is to let the world slowly get away with taking our culture away from us, replacing it with theirs. We need to protect what we love, and Pok√©mon has been around for so long that it has become part of our lives. I would hate to see it ruined by political correctness.

title: I was walking my dog when a cop pulled me over for having an open can of beer in the car, but then he said something that made my jaw drop.

He looks at me and says "Well, since you didn't seem to be bothering anyone, I'm just going to let you off with a warning. But I need you to promise me something."  I said "Sure, anything!" title: I have been watching too much anime
self_text: I am a male in my early twenties, but I have been watching too much anime and now when I go to the bathroom to take a piss I subconsciously say "Yare yare daze" while doing so. Is there any way for me to stop this?  I'm really embarrassed because I live with my mom and she heard me today and asked why I was talking to myself.

title: God is real, but his name is Valhalla
self_text: I have seen the face of God, and it is a Viking in a longboat.  He said that he wants us to raid and pillage and take all the gold we can find so that when we die we may join him in Valhalla.  He has given me the courage to fight for my people and to take back what is rightfully ours.  I am not afraid to die, because I know that if I do I will be with God in Valhalla where there are endless feasts, mead, and women.  And so I say to you all, raise your swords and let us go forth and conquer!  For Valhalla awaits!
